attributes.action: Stop Larry from posting inane drivel about his unattainable career aspirations, get a job and stop sponging off the state.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Self-explanatory really. On behalf of Roffers everywhere.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
